description.p: The dimkitten is a small feline creature that cloaks itself in shadow, and feeds on the nightmares of the unwary.

Those who awaken only see the stark blue eyes shining down at them, and are paralyzed by the strange power of the dimkitten. When at rest, they are silent and watchful, seeming to enjoy batting out burning candles and other sources of light.

The dimkitten is young and inexperienced compared to the older dimcats. As such, they are prove to be rather indistinguishable from regular cats as they hold little control over the powers they do have.

setters.set: Common and those known by its master

description.p: The dimkitten has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

description.p: Whenever the dimkitten is touching a creature that is unconscious, the creature is paralyzed until the dimkitten is no longer touching it, even if the creature wakes.

description.p: The dimkitten is always considered to be lightly obscured by magical darkness, unless it chooses to allow a creature to see through this effect.

description.p: The dimkitten takes half damage from falling heights under 20 feet, or may pass a DC 10 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check to take no damage from falling instead.
